Subclasses of Character in gameCore
 class Monster
          A Monster is a subclass of NPC.
 class Player
          A Character is a superclass for all of the animated creatures inside the game.
 

Methods in gameCore that return Character
 Character Tile.getCharacter()
          Gets the character on the current tile
 Character Tile.getCharacter(java.lang.String direction)
          Gets the character on the adjacent tile in the given direction
 Character Tile.removeCharacter()
          Removes the Character on the tile
 

Methods in gameCore with parameters of type Character
 void Tile.addCharacter(Character c)
          Adds a character to the tile
 boolean Character.attack(Character c)
          Attack method allows one character to attack another.
 boolean Exit.canCross(Character crosser)
          Checks whether the Exit is unlocked or locked and the character has the key
 boolean Edge.canCross(Character crosser)
          Checks if the given character can cross the edge
 Tile Exit.cross(Tile currentTile, Character crosser)
          Places a Character on the Tile on the other side of the Edge
 Tile Edge.cross(Tile currentTile, Character crosser)
          Places a Character on the other side of the Edge from the given Tile
 void Character.use(Item i, Character c)
          Method to use an item like a weapon on a character.
